name: StudentHire
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: student hire
des:
Get your Amazon onboarding questions answered with Amazon Student Program’s new Alexa skill! Ask the skill things like:

· When will my background check get initiated?

· Tell me about Amazon’s leadership principles.

· What is it like to work at Amazon?

This skill is accessible by only candidates with accepted offers through Amazon Student Programs. To fully enable the skill you must have an access code provided by Amazon Student Programs. If you have questions or feedback when trying to access or use the skill, reach out to your recruiting point of contact.
